column2:
{u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'cat > /userdata/solo.rb <<SOLORB
', u"cookbook_path ['/userdata']
", u'SOLORB
', u'
', u'chef-solo --config /userdata/solo.rb --log_level auto --force-formatter --json-attributes /userdata/dromedary/attributes.json
', u'node -v 
', u'npm -v
']]}
Security group id of app instance
Public DNS of Dromedary App instance
DynamoDb table name for persistent storage

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -xe
', u'yum update -y aws-cfn-bootstrap
', u'
', u'# Helper functions
', u'function error_exit
', u'{
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 1 -r "$1"', u' --stack ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackName'}, u' --resource WebServerInstance ', u' --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'
', u'  exit 1
', u'}
', u'function cfn_init
', u'{
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -v -s ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u' -r WebServerInstance --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u' --role ', {u'Ref': u'CfnInitRole'}, u' "$@"
', u'}
', u'function cfn_signal_ok
', u'{
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 0 ', u' --stack ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackName'}, u' --resource WebServerInstance ', u' --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u' || true
', u'}
', u'
', u'if ! which chef-solo > /dev/null 2>&2; then
', u"  cfn_init -c chef || error_exit 'Failed to run cfn-init chef'
", u'fi
', u'
', u'if [ -e /.dromedary-prereqs-installed ]; then
', u"  cfn_init -c noprereqs || error_exit 'Failed to run cfn-init noprereqs'
", u'else
', u'  yum -y upgrade
', u"  cfn_init || error_exit 'Failed to run cfn-init'
", u'fi
', u'cfn_signal_ok
', u'
']]}}
Resource Tags for Deployment Group (non-zero enables CodeDeploy agent)
VPC id in which to place instance
Path to tarball in Artifact Bucket
[{u'DeleteOnTermination': u'true', u'DeviceIndex': u'0', u'SubnetId': {u'Ref': u'SubnetId'}, u'GroupSet': [{u'Ref': u'InstanceSecurityGroup'}], u'AssociatePublicIpAddress': u'true'}]

{u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'cat > /userdata/solo.rb <<SOLORB
', u"cookbook_path ['/userdata']
", u'SOLORB
', u'
', u'chef-solo --config /userdata/solo.rb --log_level auto --force-formatter --json-attributes /userdata/dromedary/attributes-noprereqs.json
', u'node -v 
', u'npm -v
']]}

[{u'ToPort': u'22', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'152.3.4.5/32', u'FromPort': u'22'}, {u'ToPort': u'80', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'0.0.0.0/0', u'FromPort': u'80'}, {u'ToPort': u'443', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'0.0.0.0/0', u'FromPort': u'443'}, {u'ToPort': u'8080', u'IpProtocol': u'tcp', u'CidrIp': u'0.0.0.0/0', u'FromPort': u'8080'}]

{u'Fn::If': [u'InstallCodeDeploy', [{u'Value': {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u'Key': u'Application'}, {u'Value': {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackName'}, u'Key': u'Name'}, {u'Value': {u'Ref': u'CodeDeployTag'}, u'Key': u'environment'}], [{u'Value': {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u'Key': u'Application'}, {u'Value': {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackName'}, u'Key': u'Name'}]]}
VPC subnet id in which to place instance
